	</script>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--xl"><a class="postid-37454536" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/nyc-mayoral-debate-live-updates-10-22-2025/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Hs Lede Module | Module 1&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/nyc-mayoral-debate-live-updates-10-22-2025\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Hs Lede Module | Module 1&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">Zohran Mamdani attacks &#8216;desperate man&#8217; Andrew Cuomo in opening of final NYC mayoral debate</a></h2>
<p class="story__excerpt body body--md"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/nyc-mayoral-debate-live-updates-10-22-2025/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Hs Lede Module | Module 1&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/nyc-mayoral-debate-live-updates-10-22-2025\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Hs Lede Module | Module 1&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">Follow live updates as Zohran Mamdani, Andrew Cuomo and Curtis Sliwa face off in the final NYC mayoral debate.</a></p></div></div></div>

			<div class="ad-slot skeleton skeleton--ad skeleton--div-gpt-ad-billb_mid">

		<script type="text/plain" class="optanon-category-C0023">
			var adWrapper = document.querySelector('.slideshow-ad-wrapper');
			if (typeof googletag !== 'undefined') {
				googletag.cmd.push(function() {
					if (window.definedSlots && -1 !== window.definedSlots.indexOf("div-gpt-ad-billb_mid")) {
						googletag.display("div-gpt-ad-billb_mid");

						console.log('div-gpt-ad-billb_mid not a defined slot', window.definedSlots || []);

<div class="module module--3up module--follow-with-desktop-border"><header class="content-header content-header--line-through"><div class="content-header__left"><h2 class="content-header__heading section-heading section-heading--shadow"><a class="section-heading__link" href="https://nypost.com/opinion" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Three Up Module | Module 4&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/opinion&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 0&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Three Up Module | Module 4&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:0}"><span class="section-heading__wrap">opinion</span></a></h2></div>
<div class="content-header__center"><h4 class="content-header__tagline sub-heading sub-heading--emphasized"><span class="">Common sense. no nonsense.</span></h4></div>
<div class="content-header__right"><a class="content-header__button button button--arrow" href="https://nypost.com/opinion" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Three Up Module | Module 4&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/opinion&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 0&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Three Up Module | Module 4&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:0}"><span class="">See All</span>

</a></div></header>

<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37455621" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/opinion/red-hot-gov-race-exposes-nj-voters-fury-heres-why/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Three Up Module | Module 4&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/opinion\/red-hot-gov-race-exposes-nj-voters-fury-heres-why\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 2&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Three Up Module | Module 4&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:2}">Red-hot gov race exposes NJ voters&#8217; fury â€” here&#8217;s why</a></h3>
</div></div></div></div>
<div class="layout__item"><div class="layout__inner"><div class="story story--3up story--i-flex story--i-flex-none-md"><div class="story__image"><a class="" <h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37454422" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/opinion/arresting-illegal-canal-street-vendors-is-a-good-thing/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Three Up Module | Module 4&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/opinion\/arresting-illegal-canal-street-vendors-is-a-good-thing\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 3&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Three Up Module | Module 4&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:3}">Arresting illegal Canal Street vendors is a good thing</a></h3>
</div></div></div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--xl headline--with-inline-webwood t-center-md"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/lifestyle/infamous-jewel-thief-slams-louvre-robbers-as-idiots-and-reveals-shocking-way-they-could-have-smuggled-gems-out-of-paris/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 5&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/lifestyle\/infamous-jewel-thief-slams-louvre-robbers-as-idiots-and-reveals-shocking-way-they-could-have-smuggled-gems-out-of-paris\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 5&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">A cut above</span>
<span class="postid-37451771">Infamous jewel thief slams Louvre robbers as &#8216;idiots&#8217; â€” and reveals how they could have smuggled gems</span></a></h2>
<p class="story__excerpt body body--md"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/lifestyle/infamous-jewel-thief-slams-louvre-robbers-as-idiots-and-reveals-shocking-way-they-could-have-smuggled-gems-out-of-paris/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 5&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/lifestyle\/infamous-jewel-thief-slams-louvre-robbers-as-idiots-and-reveals-shocking-way-they-could-have-smuggled-gems-out-of-paris\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 5&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">Reformed heist expert Larry Lawton netted an estimated $18 million in precious gemstones during a spate of robberies in the 1980s and &#8217;90s.</a></p></div></div></div></div></div></div>

<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37400513" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/health/this-little-known-plant-could-keep-your-brain-young-study/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 6&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/health\/this-little-known-plant-could-keep-your-brain-young-study\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 2&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 6&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:2}">This plant has been called a &#8216;vegetarian meatball&#8217; for having so much protein â€” it can keep your brain young, too</a></h3>
</div></div></div></div>
<div class="layout__item"><div class="layout__inner b-top b-top-none-md p-top p-top-none-md b-left-md p-left-md"><div class="story story--3up story--i-flex story--i-flex-none-md">

<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37453983" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/dems-admit-to-prolonging-shutdown-for-leverage-as-nov-1-open-enrollment-deadline-nears/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 6&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/dems-admit-to-prolonging-shutdown-for-leverage-as-nov-1-open-enrollment-deadline-nears\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 3&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 6&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:3}">Dems admit to prolonging shutdown for &#8216;leverage,&#8217; as Nov. 1 open enrollment deadline nears</a></h3>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--combo-lg-xl headline--with-inline-webwood"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/chicago-principal-claims-teacher-who-made-sick-charlie-kirk-gesture-is-the-victim-but-makes-no-mention-of-her-behavior/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 7&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/chicago-principal-claims-teacher-who-made-sick-charlie-kirk-gesture-is-the-victim-but-makes-no-mention-of-her-behavior\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 7&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Class clown</span>
<span class="postid-37454255">Chicago principal claims teacher who made sick Charlie Kirk gesture is the victim â€” but makes no mention of her behavior</span></a></h2>
<div class="story__text"><p class="story__excerpt body body--md m-bottom-none"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/chicago-principal-claims-teacher-who-made-sick-charlie-kirk-gesture-is-the-victim-but-makes-no-mention-of-her-behavior/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 7&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/chicago-principal-claims-teacher-who-made-sick-charlie-kirk-gesture-is-the-victim-but-makes-no-mention-of-her-behavior\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 7&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">Lucy Martinez, a teacher at Nathan Hale Elementary School, was recorded putting a finger to her neck and pretending to pull the trigger during a No Kings protest in the city over the weekend.</a></p></div></div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37454944" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/media/jen-psaki-says-democrats-should-talk-like-a-human-being/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 7&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/media\/jen-psaki-says-democrats-should-talk-like-a-human-being\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 2&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 7&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:2}">MSNBC host urges Dems to &#8216;talk like a human being&#8217; and &#8216;burn&#8217; DNC talking points</a></h2></div></div></div>

<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37456167" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/sports/what-a-jets-quarterback-switch-really-means-for-aaron-glenn/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Sports Plus Module | Module 8&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/sports\/what-a-jets-quarterback-switch-really-means-for-aaron-glenn\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 2&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Sports Plus Module | Module 8&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:2}">What a Jets quarterback switch really means for Aaron Glenn</a></h3></div></div></div></div>
<div class="layout__item"><div class="layout__inner p-bottom p-bottom-none-md"><div class="story story--3up story--i-flex story--i-flex-none-md"><div class="story__image"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/21/sports/world-series-the-biggest-dodgers-blue-jays-storylines/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Sports Plus Module | Module data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Sports Plus Module | Module 8&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:3}"><img width="234" height="156" src="https://nypost.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2025/10/newspress-collage-1iw6500n7-1761095172550.jpg?quality=75&amp;strip=all&amp;1761080835&amp;w=234&amp;h=156&amp;crop=1" class="attachment-nyp_small_news_v2 size-nyp_small_news_v2" alt="An image collage containing 3 images, Image 1 shows Max Scherzer #31 of the Toronto Blue Jays pitches against the Seattle Mariners toward first base after hitting a solo home run against the Milwaukee Brewers" loading="lazy" <h2 class="story__headline headline headline--combo-lg-xl headline--with-inline-webwood"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/sports/testosterone-tennis-storm-erupts-after-interview-aryna-sabalenka-seemingly-claps-back/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 11&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/sports\/testosterone-tennis-storm-erupts-after-interview-aryna-sabalenka-seemingly-claps-back\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 11&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Making a racket </span>
<span class="postid-37451409">&#8216;Testosterone&#8217; tennis storm erupts after wild interview â€” as world No. 1 seemingly claps back with bikini pics</span></a></h2>
<div class="story__text"><p class="story__excerpt body body--md m-bottom-none"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/sports/testosterone-tennis-storm-erupts-after-interview-aryna-sabalenka-seemingly-claps-back/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 11&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/sports\/testosterone-tennis-storm-erupts-after-interview-aryna-sabalenka-seemingly-claps-back\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 11&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">The Ukrainian tennis star made the comments in a new interview, with speculation swirling if the world No. 1 clapped back with bikini Instagram snaps.</a></p></div></div></div>
</div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37453963" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/tropical-storm-melissa-expected-to-become-hurricane-in-caribbean/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 11&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/tropical-storm-melissa-expected-to-become-hurricane-in-caribbean\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 3&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 11&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:3}">Tropical Storm Melissa expected to explode into major hurricane in Caribbean as path remains &#8216;very uncertain&#8217;</a></h2></div></div></div></div></div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--xl headline--with-inline-webwood t-center-md"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/trump-shoots-down-sending-ukraine-tomahawk-missiles/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 12&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/trump-shoots-down-sending-ukraine-tomahawk-missiles\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 12&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">No shot</span>
<span class="postid-37456149">Trump rules out sending Ukraine &#8216;highly complex&#8217; Tomahawk missiles</span></a></h2>
<p class="story__excerpt body body--md"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/trump-shoots-down-sending-ukraine-tomahawk-missiles/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 12&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/trump-shoots-down-sending-ukraine-tomahawk-missiles\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 12&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">â€œThe only way a Tomahawk is going to be shot is if we shot it,â€ the president added. â€œAnd we&#8217;re not going to do that.â€</a></p></div></div></div></div></div></div>
</div><div class="module module--news-5 module--follow-with-border module--precede-with-border">

<div class="story__text">

<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37456826" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/business/citi-ceo-jane-fraser-gets-added-title-of-chair-of-the-board/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 13&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/business\/citi-ceo-jane-fraser-gets-added-title-of-chair-of-the-board\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 2&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 13&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:2}">Citi boss handed chair title â€” and $25M â€” joining rival banks that have CEOs in both roles</a></h3>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--xl headline--with-inline-webwood"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/rookie-nypd-cops-save-choking-baby-in-nerve-wracking-footage/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 1 | Module 14&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/rookie-nypd-cops-save-choking-baby-in-nerve-wracking-footage\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 1 | Module 14&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">&#039;God bless them&#039;</span>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--xl headline--with-inline-webwood t-center-md"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/entertainment/a-house-of-dynamite-review-a-realistic-nuclear-war-is-turned-into-a-cheesy-disaster-flick/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 15&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/entertainment\/a-house-of-dynamite-review-a-realistic-nuclear-war-is-turned-into-a-cheesy-disaster-flick\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 15&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Bombs away</span>
<span class="postid-37455960">Realistic nuclear war is turned into a cheesy disaster flick with &#8216;A House of Dynamite&#8217;</span></a></h2>
<p class="story__excerpt body body--md"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/entertainment/a-house-of-dynamite-review-a-realistic-nuclear-war-is-turned-into-a-cheesy-disaster-flick/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 15&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/entertainment\/a-house-of-dynamite-review-a-realistic-nuclear-war-is-turned-into-a-cheesy-disaster-flick\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 15&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">The â€œyouâ€™re all going to die!â€ alarm from â€œHurt Lockerâ€ and â€œZero Dark Thirtyâ€ director Kathryn Bigelow is the king of all downers.</a></p></div></div></div></div></div></div>

<div class="story__text">
<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37455687" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/entertainment/stellan-skarsgard-slams-sons-cruel-classmates-for-nepo-baby-label-hes-isolated/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 16&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/entertainment\/stellan-skarsgard-slams-sons-cruel-classmates-for-nepo-baby-label-hes-isolated\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 16&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">Stellan SkarsgÃ¥rd slams son&#8217;s &#8216;cruel&#8217; classmates for &#8216;nepo baby&#8217; label: He&#8217;s &#8216;isolated&#8217;</a></h3>
</div></div></div></div>

<div class="story__text">
<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37453273" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/lifestyle/disney-moms-swear-by-buy-nothing-groups-for-all-their-theme-park-needs/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 16&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/lifestyle\/disney-moms-swear-by-buy-nothing-groups-for-all-their-theme-park-needs\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 2&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 16&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:2}">Disney-goers swear by this helpful money-saving hack when visiting the parks</a></h3>
</div></div></div></div>

<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37455420" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/world-news/cruise-passenger-dies-on-mediterranean-voyage-celebrating-husbands-birthday/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 16&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/world-news\/cruise-passenger-dies-on-mediterranean-voyage-celebrating-husbands-birthday\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 3&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 16&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:3}">Cruise passenger dies on Mediterranean voyage celebrating husband&#8217;s birthday</a></h3>

<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37455495" href="https://pagesix.com/2025/10/22/celebrity-news/mick-jagger-madonna-leo-dicaprio-at-frieze-london/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Page Six Module | Module 17&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/pagesix.com\/2025\/10\/22\/celebrity-news\/mick-jagger-madonna-leo-dicaprio-at-frieze-london\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 4&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Page Six Module | Module 17&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:4}">Mick Jagger, Leonardo DiCaprio and Madonna eye art while single Lily Allen mingles at Frieze London</a></h3></div></div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--combo-lg-xl headline--with-inline-webwood"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/lifestyle/nyc-disappoints-as-the-115th-safest-us-city-in-2025-report/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 18&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/lifestyle\/nyc-disappoints-as-the-115th-safest-us-city-in-2025-report\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 18&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Mean streets</span>
<span class="postid-37451213">NYC disappoints as no. 117 in safe cities ranking â€” but this metro-area town is top 5</span></a></h2>
<div class="story__text"><p class="story__excerpt body body--md m-bottom-none"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/lifestyle/nyc-disappoints-as-the-115th-safest-us-city-in-2025-report/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 18&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/lifestyle\/nyc-disappoints-as-the-115th-safest-us-city-in-2025-report\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 18&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">The study analyzed 41 indicators of safety â€” everything from violent crime and traffic fatalities to financial stability, natural disaster risk and health coverage.</a></p></div></div></div>

<div class="story__text">
<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37456239" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/lifestyle/being-a-bridesmaid-can-cost-almost-as-much-as-rent-report-says/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 18&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/lifestyle\/being-a-bridesmaid-can-cost-almost-as-much-as-rent-report-says\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 2&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 18&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:2}">Being a bridesmaid can now cost as much as your monthly rent, according to a new report</a></h2></div></div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--xl headline--with-inline-webwood t-center-md"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/sports/jason-variteks-wife-adds-intrigue-to-red-sox-coaching-future/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 19 | Sports&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/sports\/jason-variteks-wife-adds-intrigue-to-red-sox-coaching-future\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 19 | Sports&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline"></span>
<span class="postid-37452623">Red Sox great&#8217;s wife teases &#8216;other openings&#8217; with coaching future with franchise in limbo</span></a></h2>
<p class="story__excerpt body body--md"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/sports/jason-variteks-wife-adds-intrigue-to-red-sox-coaching-future/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 19 | Sports&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/sports\/jason-variteks-wife-adds-intrigue-to-red-sox-coaching-future\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 19 | Sports&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">Jason Varitek has made it abundantly clear that he wants to stay with the Boston Red Sox â€” but while his coaching future remains in limbo, his wife has considered a change in scenery.Â  Catherine Varitek took to X on Tuesday afternoon,&#8230;</a></p></div></div></div></div></div></div>

<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37456692" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/sports/anthony-kay-attempting-mlb-comeback-after-stint-in-japan/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 20&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/sports\/anthony-kay-attempting-mlb-comeback-after-stint-in-japan\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 20&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">Mets&#8217; first-round bust attempting MLB comeback after stint in Japan</a></h3>
</div></div></div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--combo-lg-xl headline--with-inline-webwood"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/sports/cbs-soccer-host-kate-scott-suffers-wardrobe-malfunction-on-live-tv/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 21&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/sports\/cbs-soccer-host-kate-scott-suffers-wardrobe-malfunction-on-live-tv\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 21&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Holding it together</span>
<span class="postid-37456087">CBS Sports host suffers wardrobe malfunction on live TV in wild moment</span></a></h2>
<div class="story__text"><p class="story__excerpt body body--md m-bottom-none"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/sports/cbs-soccer-host-kate-scott-suffers-wardrobe-malfunction-on-live-tv/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 21&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/sports\/cbs-soccer-host-kate-scott-suffers-wardrobe-malfunction-on-live-tv\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 21&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">â€œI just broke my top.&#8221;</a></p></div></div></div>
</div></div>
<div class="layout__item layout__item--sidebar b-top b-top-none-sm p-top p-top-none-sm sidebar-images--show"><div class="layout__inner"><div class="p-bottom b-bottom"><div class="story story--sm story--i-flex story--i-flex-none-sm">
<div class="story__image"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/sports/the-telling-reason-behind-angels-manager-kurt-suzukis-contract/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module <h2 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37456727" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/sports/dolphins-tua-tagovailoa-blames-height-for-lack-of-jaylen-waddle-targets/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 21&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/sports\/dolphins-tua-tagovailoa-blames-height-for-lack-of-jaylen-waddle-targets\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 3&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 21&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:3}">Struggling QB blames height for lack of targets for his star wideout</a></h2></div></div></div></div></div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--xl headline--with-inline-webwood t-center-md"><a class="" href="https://pagesix.com/2025/10/22/style/kim-kardashian-wears-black-leather-dilara-findikoglu-dress-at-london-premiere-of-alls-fair/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 22&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/pagesix.com\/2025\/10\/22\/style\/kim-kardashian-wears-black-leather-dilara-findikoglu-dress-at-london-premiere-of-alls-fair\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 22&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Chain reaction</span>
<span class="postid-37455129">Kim Kardashian smolders in black leather corset dress and layers of chains</span></a></h2>
<p class="story__excerpt body body--md"><a href="https://pagesix.com/2025/10/22/style/kim-kardashian-wears-black-leather-dilara-findikoglu-dress-at-london-premiere-of-alls-fair/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 22&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/pagesix.com\/2025\/10\/22\/style\/kim-kardashian-wears-black-leather-dilara-findikoglu-dress-at-london-premiere-of-alls-fair\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 22&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">She stepped out in a snakeskin-embossed dress originally worn by Naomi Campbell on the runway.</a></p></div></div></div></div></div></div>

<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37442886" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/21/opinion/trump-show-your-support-for-legal-immigrants-at-citizenship-ceremonies/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 23&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/21\/opinion\/trump-show-your-support-for-legal-immigrants-at-citizenship-ceremonies\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 3&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 23&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:3}">How Donald Trump can show his support for immigrants who do it right</a></h3>
</div></div></div></div></div></div></div>
</div><div class="module module--news-2 module--follow-with-border module--precede-with-border">

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--combo-lg-xl headline--with-inline-webwood"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/real-estate/kanye-wests-properties-lay-in-ruin-as-rapper-sells-14-million-wyoming-ranch/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 24&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/real-estate\/kanye-wests-properties-lay-in-ruin-as-rapper-sells-14-million-wyoming-ranch\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 24&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Walls closing in</span>
<span class="postid-37455553">Kanye West&#8217;s properties lay in ruins as rapper sells $14 million Wyoming ranch</span></a></h2>
<div class="story__text"><p class="story__excerpt body body--md m-bottom-none"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/real-estate/kanye-wests-properties-lay-in-ruin-as-rapper-sells-14-million-wyoming-ranch/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 24&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/real-estate\/kanye-wests-properties-lay-in-ruin-as-rapper-sells-14-million-wyoming-ranch\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 24&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">From his decaying Calabasas, CA, ranch to his torched church and his crumbling Yeezy headquarters, the pictures reveal the true extent of the neglect shown to West&#8217;s commercial and residential property purchases.</a></p></div></div></div>
</div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--xl headline--with-inline-webwood t-center-md"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/knife-wielding-maniac-repeatedly-stabs-san-francisco-restaurant-owner/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 25&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/knife-wielding-maniac-repeatedly-stabs-san-francisco-restaurant-owner\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 25&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Check, please</span>
<span class="postid-37450244">Crazed knife-wielding woman repeatedly stabs restaurant owner: video</span></a></h2>
<p class="story__excerpt body body--md"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/knife-wielding-maniac-repeatedly-stabs-san-francisco-restaurant-owner/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 25&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/knife-wielding-maniac-repeatedly-stabs-san-francisco-restaurant-owner\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 25&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">The savage attack unfolded when Azmi Murait, a father-of-three, asked the woman to leave his restaurant in San Francisco on Saturday night after he suspected she was doing drugs.</a></p></div></div></div></div></div></div>
</div><div class="module module--news-5 module--follow-with-border module--precede-with-border">

<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37453565" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/business/anthropic-ceo-insists-hes-no-wokester-in-wake-of-white-house-ai-czars-broadsides/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 26&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/business\/anthropic-ceo-insists-hes-no-wokester-in-wake-of-white-house-ai-czars-broadsides\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 2&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 26&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:2}">Anthropic CEO insists he&#8217;s no wokester in wake of White House AI czar&#8217;s broadsides</a></h3>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--combo-lg-xl headline--with-inline-webwood"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/us-military-bombs-drug-trafficking-boat-in-eastern-pacific-killing-2-smugglers-hegseth/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 27&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/us-military-bombs-drug-trafficking-boat-in-eastern-pacific-killing-2-smugglers-hegseth\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 27&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Under water</span>
<span class="postid-37453810">US military bombs 8th suspected drug-trafficking boat, killing 2 smugglers</span></a></h2>
<div class="story__text"><p class="story__excerpt body body--md m-bottom-none"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/us-military-bombs-drug-trafficking-boat-in-eastern-pacific-killing-2-smugglers-hegseth/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 27&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/us-military-bombs-drug-trafficking-boat-in-eastern-pacific-killing-2-smugglers-hegseth\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 27&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">TheÂ US militaryÂ carried out another strike on a suspected drug vessel, this time in the Eastern Pacific,Â Secretary of WarÂ Pete Hegseth announced Wednesday.</a></p></div></div></div>

<div class="story__text">
<h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37452105" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/lifestyle/heres-how-body-image-is-quietly-shaping-american-lives-new-survey-reveals/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 29&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/lifestyle\/heres-how-body-image-is-quietly-shaping-american-lives-new-survey-reveals\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 29&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">Hereâ€™s how body image is quietly shaping American lives, new survey reveals</a></h3>
</div></div></div></div>
<div class="layout__item"><div class="layout__inner b-top b-top-none-md p-top p-top-none-md p-left-half-md p-right-half-md p-bottom-half p-bottom-none-md"><div class="story story--3up story--i-flex story--i-flex-none-md">
<div class="story__image"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/chess-superstar-daniel-naroditsky-was-incoherent-in-final-stream-before-his-death/" tabIndex="" <h3 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37453518" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/opinion/mikie-sherrills-quiet-quitting-is-extreme-even-for-our-privileged-political-class/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 29&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/opinion\/mikie-sherrills-quiet-quitting-is-extreme-even-for-our-privileged-political-class\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 3&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 5 | Module 29&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:3}">Mikie Sherrill&#8217;s quiet-quitting is extreme even for our privileged political class</a></h3>
</div></div></div></div></div></div></div>
</div><div class="module module--news-2 module--follow-with-border module--precede-with-border">

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--combo-lg-xl headline--with-inline-webwood"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/world-news/terrified-ukrainian-toddlers-cling-to-firefighters-after-russia-blasts-kindergarten-with-killer-drones/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 30&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/world-news\/terrified-ukrainian-toddlers-cling-to-firefighters-after-russia-blasts-kindergarten-with-killer-drones\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 30&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Low blow</span>
<span class="postid-37450563">Terrified Ukrainian toddlers cling to firefighters after Russia blasts kindergarten with killer drones</span></a></h2>
<div class="story__text"><p class="story__excerpt body body--md m-bottom-none"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/world-news/terrified-ukrainian-toddlers-cling-to-firefighters-after-russia-blasts-kindergarten-with-killer-drones/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 30&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/world-news\/terrified-ukrainian-toddlers-cling-to-firefighters-after-russia-blasts-kindergarten-with-killer-drones\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 30&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">Russia blasted a Ukrainian kindergarten with killer drones, setting the facility aflame &#8212; with gut-wrenching photos showing terrified toddlers crying as they clung to first responders.</a></p></div></div></div>
</div></div>

				<span>exclusive</span>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--xl headline--with-inline-webwood t-center-md"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/real-estate/beverly-hills-home-that-diane-keaton-renovated-asks-25m/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 31&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/real-estate\/beverly-hills-home-that-diane-keaton-renovated-asks-25m\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 31&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Something&#039;s gotta give</span>
<span class="postid-37453899">A Beverly Hills home that Diane Keaton renovated and sold to Ryan Murphy asks $25M &#8212; with her touches intact</span></a></h2>
<p class="story__excerpt body body--md"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/real-estate/beverly-hills-home-that-diane-keaton-renovated-asks-25m/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 31&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/real-estate\/beverly-hills-home-that-diane-keaton-renovated-asks-25m\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 31&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">The residence at 820 North Roxbury Drive at one point was also home to Madonna.</a></p></div></div></div></div></div></div>
</div><div class="module module--3up module--external-content module--follow-with-border module--follow-with-thick-border module--precede-with-border"><div class="content-header m-bottom-half m-bottom-md"><div class=""><div class=""><div class="content-header-inner"><span class="content-header__intro-text">Content provided by</span>

<div class="story__text">

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--xl headline--with-inline-webwood t-center-md"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/entertainment/jessica-alba-shows-off-beach-body-in-australia-while-filming-movie/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 33&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/entertainment\/jessica-alba-shows-off-beach-body-in-australia-while-filming-movie\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 33&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Solo act</span>
<span class="postid-37448497">Jessica Alba shows off beach bod in Australia as relationship rumors swirl</span></a></h2>
<p class="story__excerpt body body--md"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/entertainment/jessica-alba-shows-off-beach-body-in-australia-while-filming-movie/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 33&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/entertainment\/jessica-alba-shows-off-beach-body-in-australia-while-filming-movie\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | Big Photo Module | Module 33&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">Jessica Alba enjoys beach time in Australia during filming for &#8216;The Mark&#8217; and sparks romance rumors.</a></p></div></div></div></div></div></div>
</div><div class="module module--news-5 module--follow-with-border module--precede-with-border">

				<span>exclusive details</span>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37453757" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/us-news/ny-father-and-daughter-receive-hero-award-for-stopping-man-from-killing-wife/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 35&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/us-news\/ny-father-and-daughter-receive-hero-award-for-stopping-man-from-killing-wife\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 2&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 35&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:2}">Fearless NY father, daughter receive hero award for stopping knife-wielding man from killing wife</a></h2></div></div></div></div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--combo-lg-xl headline--with-inline-webwood"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/lifestyle/london-restaurant-don-ciccio-takes-swipe-at-locals-after-closing/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 35&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/lifestyle\/london-restaurant-don-ciccio-takes-swipe-at-locals-after-closing\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 3&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 35&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:3}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Ciao time</span>
<span class="postid-37449463">Furious restaurant takes savage swipe at locals after closing down</span></a></h2>
<div class="story__text"><p class="story__excerpt body body--md m-bottom-none"><a href="https://nypost.com/2025/10/22/lifestyle/london-restaurant-don-ciccio-takes-swipe-at-locals-after-closing/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 35&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/2025\/10\/22\/lifestyle\/london-restaurant-don-ciccio-takes-swipe-at-locals-after-closing\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 3&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 35&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:3}">An Italian restaurant has taken a savage swipe at locals after closing down &#8211; saying: &#8220;Thank you for never supporting us, not even once.&#8221;</a></p></div></div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--combo-lg-xl headline--with-inline-webwood"><a class="" href="https://nypost.com/article/best-fitness-workout-wellness-gifts/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 38 | post wanted&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/article\/best-fitness-workout-wellness-gifts\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 38 | post wanted&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline">Resolution ready</span>
<span class="postid-24840014">Lock in with the best fitness and wellness gifts of 2025: from sauna blankets to smartwatches</span></a></h2>
<div class="story__text"><p class="story__excerpt body body--md m-bottom-none"><a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-fitness-workout-wellness-gifts/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 38 | post wanted&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/nypost.com\/article\/best-fitness-workout-wellness-gifts\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 38 | post wanted&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">We&#8217;re working on our fitness (and our gift-giving).</a></p></div></div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--combo-lg-xl headline--with-inline-webwood"><a class="" href="https://decider.com/2025/10/11/diane-keaton-dead-at-79/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 40 | DECIDER&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/decider.com\/2025\/10\/11\/diane-keaton-dead-at-79\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 40 | DECIDER&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="webwood webwood--inline"></span>
<span class="postid-37358927">R.I.P. Diane Keaton: &#8216;Annie Hall&#8217; Oscar Winner And Style Icon Dead At 79</span></a></h2>
<div class="story__text"><p class="story__excerpt body body--md m-bottom-none"><a href="https://decider.com/2025/10/11/diane-keaton-dead-at-79/" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 40 | DECIDER&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/decider.com\/2025\/10\/11\/diane-keaton-dead-at-79\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 40 | DECIDER&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">The beloved actress also appeared in The Godfather, Reds, The First Wives Club, and more.</a></p></div></div></div>
</div></div>

<h2 class="story__headline headline headline--sm"><a class="postid-37347698" href="https://decider.com/2025/10/10/special-forces-brianna-chickenfry-lapaglia-zach-bryan/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 40 | DECIDER&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/decider.com\/2025\/10\/10\/special-forces-brianna-chickenfry-lapaglia-zach-bryan\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 3&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | News Module 2 | Module 40 | DECIDER&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:3}">Brianna &#8220;Chickenfry&#8221; LaPaglia Drags Ex-Boyfriend Zach Bryan In &#8216;Special Forces&#8217;: &#8220;Got Famous On TikTok And Thinks He&#8217;s God&#8221;</a></h2></div></div></div></div></div></div>

<div class="story__text">

				<h4 class="widget--covers__cta sub-heading sub-heading--sm">Flip for back cover</h4>
				<div class="widget__covers">

		<h3 class="button-wrap-lines__inner m-bottom-none">
			<a
				href="https://nypost.com/horoscopes/"
				class="button button--arrow"

				{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Horoscope Widget&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:&quot;All Horoscopes&quot;}				"

		</h3>

<div class="widget widget--border widget--sports-podcasts">
	<h4 class="subsection-heading subsection-heading--underline">
		Sports Podcasts	</h4>
	<p><a href="https://nypost.com/podcasts/" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Sports Podcasts&quot;}"><img src="https://vip.nypost.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2019/10/podcast_nypsports_ny_post_sports_sidebar_widget_image_520x280_b.jpg?quality=90&amp;strip=all" alt="Sports Podcasts" width="260" height="174" /></a></p>
<div class="widget--sports-podcasts__sub-heading">The best insights from the ultimate insiders</div>
<ul class="sports-podcasts">

			</div>

			window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];

				<script type="text/plain" class="optanon-category-C0024">
			window.ga4Dims = window.ga4Dims || {};
			if ( typeof nypost_screen !== 'undefined' ) {
				window.ga4Dims.screen = nypost_screen;
			}
			
			// News Connect Global Identifier
			var ncgGetCookie = function( name ) {
				var regexp = new RegExp( '(?:^' + name + '|;*' + name + ')=(.*?)(?:;|$)', 'g' ),
					result = regexp.exec( document.cookie );

				return ( null === result ) ? null : result[1];
			}

			var ncgId = ncgGetCookie( '_ncg_id_' );
			if ( null !== ncgId ) {
				window.ga4Dims.ncg_id = ncgId;
			}

			var ncgSpId = ncgGetCookie( '_ncg_sp_id\.[^=]*' );
			if ( null !== ncgSpId ) {
				window.ga4Dims.ncg_sp_id = ncgSpId;
			}

			var gaAutId = ncgGetCookie( '_autid' );
			if ( null !== gaAutId ) {
				window.ga4Dims.ga_aut_id = gaAutId;
			}

			// Get Amazon links.
			var hasAmazon = "false";
			var links = document.links;
			var amazonLinks = [];
			var ga4EventData;
			for (var i = 0; links.length > i; i++) {
				if (
					links[i].href.indexOf('amazon.com') > 0
					&& !links[i].classList.contains('buy-button')
					&& !links[i].dataset.skipAmazonTracking
				) {
					var amazonGa4Event = JSON.stringify({
						event_name: 'ux_engagement',
						source_unit: 'amazon',
						source_position: i + 1
					});

					if (links[i].dataset.ga4Event) {
						var currentGa4Event = links[i].dataset.ga4Event;
						if (Array.isArray(currentGa4Event)) {
							currentGa4Event.push(amazonGa4Event);
							ga4EventData = currentGa4Event;
						} else {
							ga4EventData = '[' + currentGa4Event + ',' + amazonGa4Event + ']';
						}
					} else {
						ga4EventData = amazonGa4Event;
					}

										links[i].setAttribute(
						'data-ga4-event',
						ga4EventData
					);
					
					amazonLinks.push(links[i].href);
					hasAmazon = "amazon";
				}
			}
			window.ga4Dims.contains_commerce_link = hasAmazon;

			if (amazonLinks.length > 0) {
				window.ga4Dims.commerce_links = amazonLinks.join();
			}

					</script>
				<script type="text/javascript">
			// Send an event on clicks for link elements with data-nyp-affiliate="true", wait until the document has loaded.
			document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
				const affiliateLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"]');
				// Return early if we don't have any links.
				if ( ! affiliateLinks ) {
					return;
				}
				// Loop through the links and add the event listener.
				affiliateLinks.forEach(function(link) {
					link.addEventListener('click', function(event) {

						const {
							nypScripts: {
								nypost_wp_vars: {
									nypostSite: siteId = '',
								} = {},
							} = {},
						} = window;

						// Check if we are on the element with the a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"].
						let link = event.target;
						if ( 'true' !== link.dataset.nypAffiliate ) {
							// If not, get the closest one then get the href from that.
							link = event.target.closest('a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"]');
						}

						// Get the URL from the link.
						let href = link.href || '';

						// Bail if we don't have a href.
						if ( ! href ) {
							return;
						}

						// If the URL does not have the protocol we need to add it or URL() will throw an error.
						if (!href.startsWith('http://') && !href.startsWith('https://')) {
							href = 'https://' + href;
						}

						// Get the URL from the link.
						if (href.match(new RegExp(`https?://go.${siteId}.com/`))) {
							// Extract the URL from the skimlinks href.
							href = new URL(href).searchParams.get('url') || href;
						}

						// Ensure Trackonomics links "clicks.trx-hub.com" send the correct data to gtag.
						if (href.includes('clicks.trx-hub.com')) {
							// assign the original url (q parameter) from the href variable
							href = decodeURIComponent(new URL(href).searchParams.get('q')) || href;
						}

						// Get the URL hostname, for example: www.amazon.com.
						const retailer = new URL(href).hostname;

						gtag('event', 'outbound', {
							'internal_source': window.location.href,
							'external_destination': href,
							'retailer': retailer,
							'post_id': "",
						});
					});
				});
			});
		</script>

		<script>
	(function() {
		let nypid = window.localStorage?.getItem('nyp_id');

		if (nypid) {
			const id = { name: 'ny_post_id', value: nypid };
			window.OB_ppids = window.OB_ppids || [];
			window.OB_ppids.push(id);
		} else {
			let ppidSet = false;
			window.addEventListener('nyp-aqfer:nyp-id-ready', (e) => {
				if (!ppidSet && e instanceof CustomEvent) {
					const nypid = e.detail.nypId || null;
					const id = { name: 'ny_post_id', value: nypid };
					window.OB_ppids = window.OB_ppids || [];
					window.OB_ppids.push(id);
					ppidSet = true;
				}
			});
		}
	})();
